radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased MIBI uptake in the hyperplastic lesion in early imaging; no extinction of the uptake in delayed imaging.
Detected a low-density lesion about 2.1 x 1.4 x 1.2 cm under the left lobe of the thyroid gland.
Malunion of the right femur neck and osteoporosis of the pelvis.
Superscan and asymmetrically increased MDP uptake of partial ribs and the right femur neck.
